```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

```

Read

```{r}

pie_crab <- lterdatasampler::pie_crab


ggplot(pie_crab, aes(y = latitude, x = size)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(caption = "Caption Space for clarity")

```

Table of mean sd and sample size

```{r}

crab_df <- pie_crab |> 
  group_by(latitude, site) |> 
  summarize(mean_size = round(mean(size), 2), 
            sd_size = round(sd(size), 2),
            sample_size = n()) |> 
  kable(col.names = c("Latitude", "Site", "Mean Size", "SD Size", "Sample Size"))

crab_df


```
